full_summary:
## Request for Standing Offer - Carbonless Papers
### Solicitation Number
WS4031539647

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Correctional Service Canada, invites offers to stand for a Regional Individual Standing Offer for the acquisition of carbonless papers, including delivery, for a location in La Macaza, Quebec, Canada. 

### Tender Details
- **Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, July 26, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
- **Delivery Location:** La Macaza, Quebec, Canada
- **Goods and Services:** Carbonless papers and delivery
- **Trade Agreements:** Compliant with the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Eligibility
The standing offer will be valid for a period of one year from the expected contract start date. All suppliers must have a valid GSIN (Grouping of Special Material) registration to be eligible to participate in this tender.

### Contact Information
Inquires should be addressed to:
Lisa-Marie Julien (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
 Please note that the contact information is based on the given data, it may be necessary to verify the accuracy of the contact information before proceeding.

### Disclaimer
The notices and associated documentation are available on: None (Note: The information is likely not publicly available and may require access to a government portal or system).
